mapper.update: update article set a_state=0 where a_id=#{aid}
mapper.delete: delete from favorites where u_id=#{uid} and a_id=#{aid}
update draft set d_state=0 where d_id=#{did}
mapper.select: select a_title,a_tags,a_content,a_time,a_author from article where a_id=#{id}
SELECT a_tags FROM article where a_state=1 and a_scope='公开'
select count(*) from article where a_state='1' and a_scope='公开'
select a_id,a_title from article where a_state='1' and a_scope='公开' ORDER BY a_id desc
select u_id from user where u_name=#{name}
select a_id,a_title,LEFT(a_content,100) as a_content,a_time from article where a_state=1 and a_author=#{name} ORDER BY a_id desc
select a_title,a_content,a_tags,a_scope from article where a_id=#{aid}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM article where a_author=#{name} and (a_time like CONCAT(#{month},'%')) and a_state=1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM article where a_author=#{name} and (a_time like CONCAT(#{year},'%')) and a_state=1
select a_id,a_title,a_tags,a_scope,LEFT(a_content,200) as a_content,a_time,a_author from article where a_state=1 and a_scope='公开' and a_tags LIKE CONCAT('%',#{tagname},'%') ORDER BY a_id desc
select count(*) from favorites where u_id=#{uid} and a_id=#{aid}
select a.a_id,a_title,f.f_time as a_time from article a, favorites f where f.a_id=a.a_id and f.u_id=#{uid} ORDER BY a_id desc
select d_id a_id,d_title a_title,d_time a_time from draft where d_state=1 and d_author=#{name} ORDER BY d_id desc
select d_title a_title,d_content a_content,d_tags a_tags,d_scope a_scope from draft where d_id=#{did}
